item.description:
Announcing another fantastic evening of board games at the Portsmouth Public Library.

Please join us for a night of games and fun.

I will be bringing a selection of games for people to choose from, but if you have a specific game you would like to try please message me and if I have it we will try and get it on the table.

Latecomers are welcome, but please let me know what time you plan on arriving so I can try and have a game ready for you.

Also at the game night I would like to start a discussion on what days would be good for the next few Meetups. The library has provided me with some dates that the room will be open.

The Meetup will go until 8:30pm. After the meetup I ask that people please help put the tables away.

I hope to see you there, and as always if you have any questions please feel free to send a message!
item.how_to_find_us: Hilton Garden Inn Room - 2nd Floor Ask for Wayne

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: Community Game Night at the Portsmouth Public Library
